description: Data was extracted from the CCLE program in April 2019. This table contains sample data for CCLE primary cell lines. More details: see https://portals.broadinstitute.org/ccle/about

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Sample bar code; CCLE appended with the case barcode
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: GDC unique identifier for this CCLE project and cell line
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: A case barcode assigned to the project/cell line record; same as the cell line primary name.
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Two-digit sample type code; 50 = Cell Lines, 13 = EBV Immortalized Normal
fields.name: sample_type

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; e.g. CCLE-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name
